location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Mount Aboo [Ä€bu] to Gaspar Rozario, No.7 Grant Building, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Mr Rozario's desire to apply for the honorary rank of Assistant Surgeon and Pelly's opinion that this should be granted to him owing to his long and valuable service in the Gulf of Oman and Persia and in Central Asia.The letter states that he may show Pelly's letter to relevant officials in relation to the application and noting that the medical appointment at Zanzibar was still being considered at the India Office and Foreign Office.
